text: William J. "Bill" Hochul Jr. (born April 1, 1959) is an American attorney who is the current first gentleman of New York as the husband of Governor Kathy Hochul. He was also the second gentleman of New York from 2015 to 2021 when his wife was lieutenant governor. Hochul also served as United States attorney for the Western District of New York from 2010 to 2016 under President Barack Obama. == References == Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Buffalo, New York Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of New York (state)
title: William J. Hochul Jr.
